thread.title: Tang Wai Kit
thread.title_full: Bravofly.com reviewed by Tang Wai Kit

author: Tang Wai Kit
title: Tang Wai Kit
text: I will use the turn around time to gauge the service standard of any Companies. Speedy Response gives me confident and motivate me further in dealing with the respective companies. In this respect, Bravofly have achieved it and I am happy to continue looking at services provided by your company.
